body:
On Media
By HADAS GOLD and  DYLAN BYERS
8/5/15 8:07 PM EDT
Tomorrow's debate is expected to draw high ratings. 
The debate is just the beginning of a long preseason. 
Political data gurus defend writing off Donald Trump.
"The Daily Show" set will be displayed at  the Newseum.
It's looking more likely Google is planning to buy Twitter.
And Al Sharpton promises to grill Hillary Clinton. 
© 2015 POLITICO LLC

title: Remainders
